Html:
Hi.

Is it possible to show a specific area? Like a country?In my application I just want to show my country.

Sorry if this question it's a repost.

Tks a lot.
Like demo, you just show Lithuania. How do you do that?

well Lithuania has its own map, but if you use google/etc you should use functon public bool SetZoomToFitRect(RectLatLng rect), and pass your country boundaries in coordinates. You can also set boundaries for map with public RectLatLng? BoundsOfMap. So user can drag map only in that area.
